page.title: 17RATBY BAND.
page.content: Ratby Band was formed around 1906. It has a varying membership but is usually between 30-40.The band has been to Germany and Holland and has made one record called 'Reflections' which was quite successful.The band has given several notable performances but the most outstanding was the one which won them the World Championship in Holland.The band meets two or three times a week in the local working men's club but would dearly love to have their own band room.The band helps to teach young musicians to play brass and percussion instruments so they can play at carnivals and fetes. The local community benefits from the efforts of the band because they help to raise money for various funds and give pleasure at the same time.Bands are traditional and those who belong enjoy the music and company.
